message: Did hosting for pythonkc.com get figured out?  If not I can get a server setup for the group to use.

The other conversation we'll have later is if they'd be willing to keep our account free when they come out of beta, since we're a group, not a for-pofit co. Maybe we put their logo at the side or bottom of the page (e.g., "built with...")
We have a beta account with gondor.io, which we're actively deploying to right now.
